Author: @Hellenium_core
Title: [ANN] $ 1.000.000 [BOUNTY]-HELLENIUM (HLN) - The Amazon equivalent for services
Body: Dear all,  we proudly announce today the beginning of our Hellenium pre-ICO campaign.  The Hellenium Project is a revolutionary idea. One that is based on socioeconomics according to which it is a community that generate the rules of the game within the society, not business "objectives". It is the future, the beginning of a fair society where businesses share persuasive power with the consumer, where human needs take priority and replace marketing induced consumer behaviours.  Please read our whitepaper to find out more.  With your help we will be able to reduce consumer and commuter prices for service provision by as much as 50% starting from anything related to mobility which absorbs 25% of anyone's income. That alone can lift 10% of any developed country's population above the poverty level. When was the last time that your motor insurance premiums, your pension contribution, your mass transport ticket, your parking fees etc. where reduced? We bet never in your living memory. We intend to change that. That will be a salary increase by default.  Hellenium (HLN) will be not just a token it is a principle and our vision of the future. We need you to make it a reality. Hellenium (HLN) tokens will represent EQUITY in our business, they will entitle its holders to DIVIDENDS and it will allow USAGE & RETENTION BASED MINING! Tokens acquired through the bounty campaign will not need to depend only on price appreciation but will enjoy all of the above rights and benefits. And there is more: Our bounty campaign makes provision in addition to the free tokens for Employment Points (we think for the first time ever). That means that if you have the right skill set and you love what we do, you will have priority compared to anyone else with equal skills, to join our Business.  When was the last time someone was offering you FREE SHARES of his business AND A WELL PAID JOB?  Visit our campaign site www.hellenium.com and please honour us by reading our Whitepaper before you open the Bounty document. It will help you make sense of what we are asking in it.  Please forward all questions you may have at our Telegram board at https://t.me/joinchat/AAAAAEOWZMy3tYG8pfO_Fw or in this forum.  Thank you all in advance  The Hellenium team -- Today is a good day

Body: Forum,  Για όσους δεν αντιλήφθηκαν περι τίνος πρόκειται:  ΣΑΣ ΔΙΝΟΥΜΕ ΤΗΝ ΕΥΚΑΙΡΙΑ ΓΙΑ ΚΑΡΙΕΡΑ ΚΑΙ ΕΠΙΠΛΕΟΝ ΔΩΡΕΑΝ ΜΕΤΟΧΕΣ ΑΠΟ ΤΗΝ ΕΤΑΙΡΙΑ ΜΑΣ. ΠΟΙΟΣ ΕΧΕΙ ΤΑ ΚΟΤΣΙΑ ΝΑ ΒΟΗΘΗΣΕΙ. ΤΟ BOUNTY ΕΙΝΑΙ ΔΕΥΤΕΡΕΥΟΝ (ΟΧΙ ΟΤΙ ΔΕΝ ΕΙΝΑΙ ΣΗΜΑΝΤΙΚΟ) ΨΑΧΝΟΥΜΕ ΓΙΑ ΣΤΕΛΕΧΗ. ΔΕΙΧΤΕ ΜΑΣ ΤΙ ΜΠΟΡΕΙΤΕ ΝΑ ΚΑΝΕΤΕ. Η ΕΔΡΑ ΤΗΣ ΕΤΑΙΡΙΑΣ ΘΑ ΕΙΝΑΙ ΣΤΗΝ ΕΛΛΑΔΑ  Η ΟΜΑΔΑ ΠΙΣΩ ΑΠΟ ΤΟ ΜΕΓΑΛΥΤΕΡΟ ΠΡΟΤΖΕΚΤ ΣΤΑ ICO ΣΗΜΕΡΑ
